text: Relictocera is a genus of southeast Asian araneomorph spiders in the family Psilodercidae, containing the single species, Relictocera qiyi. It was first described by F. Y. Li & S. Q. Li in 2017, and has only been found in Vietnam. ==References== ==External links== Category:Monotypic Araneomorphae genera Category:Psilodercidae
title: Relictocera
